labels.analysis: The Yuque MCP Server primarily focuses on integrating with the Yuque knowledge base platform to manage documents and retrieve user information. Its core functionality revolves around creating, reading, updating, and deleting documents, as well as providing analytics and statistics related to content usage. The tools available enable seamless content management, user information retrieval, and data analysis, making it a versatile tool for knowledge management and collaboration. The server also includes powerful analytics features to gain insights from user interactions and document usage.
labels.reasoning: The primary label is "Memory Management" because the server's main functionality is centered around document and knowledge base management, which aligns with storing, retrieving, and organizing information. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" is selected due to the emphasis on providing statistics and analytics related to user and document interactions. A custom label "Knowledge Management System" is added to capture the unique focus on managing and analyzing knowledge base content.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Yuque MCP Server
server_info_crawled.author: @lvshiyu21/yuque-mcp-server
server_info_crawled.overview: Integrate with the Yuque knowledge base platform to manage documents and retrieve user information. Create, read, update, and delete documents seamlessly while leveraging AI capabilities. Enhance your workflow with powerful tools for content management and analytics.

tools.name: get_current_user
tools.description: Deploy Server Yuque MCP Server @lvshiyu21/yuque-mcp-server Try in Playground get_current_user

tools.name: get_user_docs
tools.description: 获取当前用户的所有知识库文档列表，包括私人和协作文档

tools.name: get_user_repos
tools.description: 获取指定用户的知识库列表，知识库是语雀中组织文档的集合

tools.name: get_repo_docs
tools.description: 获取特定知识库中的所有文档列表，包括文档标题、更新时间等信息

tools.name: get_doc
tools.description: 获取语雀中特定文档的详细内容，包括正文、修改历史和权限信息（支持分块处理大型文档）

tools.name: create_doc
tools.description: 在指定知识库中创建新的语雀文档，支持多种格式内容

tools.name: update_doc
tools.description: 更新语雀中已存在的文档，可以修改标题、内容或权限设置

tools.name: delete_doc
tools.description: 从语雀知识库中删除指定文档，此操作不可撤销

tools.name: search
tools.description: 在语雀平台中搜索文档或知识库内容，支持范围和作者筛选

tools.name: get_group_statistics
tools.description: 获取团队的汇总统计数据，包括成员人数、文档数量、阅读量和互动数据等

tools.name: get_group_member_statistics
tools.description: 获取团队成员的统计数据，包括各成员的编辑次数、阅读量、点赞量等

tools.name: get_group_book_statistics
tools.description: 获取团队知识库的统计数据，包括各知识库的文档数、字数、阅读量等

tools.name: get_group_doc_statistics
tools.description: 获取团队文档的统计数据，包括各文档的字数、阅读量、评论量等

tools.name: get_doc_chunks_info
tools.description: 获取文档的分块元信息，包括总块数、每块的字符数等

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@lvshiyu21/yuque-mcp-server/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())

smithery_configuration_requirements.name: yuqueApiToken
smithery_configuration_requirements.description: Your Yuque API token for authenticating with the Yuque API.
